title: Federate Module
description: Create a federated module, which is exposed by a Producer (remote) and can be subsequently loaded by a Consumer (host).

examples.description: Create a federated module from my-remote-app, that exposes my-cmp from ./src/component/my-cmp.ts as MyModule.
Create a federated module from myProducer, that exposes my-cmp from ./src/component/my-cmp.ts as MyModule.

path.description: The path to locate the federated module.
path.x-prompt: What is the path to the module to be federated?

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the module?

remote.x-prompt: What is/should the Producer (remote) be named?

remoteDirectory.description: The directory of the new Producer (remote) application if one needs to be created.

style.description: The file extension to be used for style files for the Producer (remote) if one needs to be created.

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests of the Producer (remote) if it needs to be created. `vitest-analog` uses AnalogJS-based setup with `@nx/vitest`. It defaults to `vitest-analog` for Angular versions >= 21.0.0, otherwise `jest`.
unitTestRunner.x-prompt: Which unit test runner would you like to use?

e2eTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for end to end (e2e) tests of the Producer (remote) if it needs to be created.

standalone.description: Whether to generate the Producer (remote) application with standalone components if it needs to be created.

host.description: The Consumer (host) application for this Producer (remote).
